TypeSignature.Value: public interface IExtension<T> where T : IExtensibleObject<T>
.class public interface auto ansi abstract IExtension`1<(class System.ServiceModel.IExtensibleObject`1<!T>) T>
generic <typename T> where T : IExtensibleObject<T>public interface class IExtension

typeparam.name: T
typeparam.span: 参与自定义行为的对象。

span.span: The object that participates in the custom behavior.

summary.span: 使对象可以通过聚合扩展另一个对象。

span.span: Enables an object to extend another object through aggregation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 允许您通过使用可扩展对象模式添加新状态或行为来扩展 对象（、、 和 类）。 allows you to extend objects (the , , , and classes) by adding a new state or behavior by using its extensible object pattern. 在 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 中，可扩展对象模式可用于对现有的运行时类扩展新功能，或者将新状态功能添加到对象中。The extensible object pattern is used in [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] to either extend existing run-time classes with new functionality or to add new state features to an object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Attach(!T owner) cil managed

param.name: owner
param.span: 聚合此扩展的可扩展对象。

span.span: The extensible object that aggregates this extension.

summary.span: 使扩展对象可以查找它聚合的时间。

span.span: Enables an extension object to find out when it has been aggregated.

summary.span: 当扩展添加到 属性中时调用。

span.span: Called when the extension is added to the property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Detach(!T owner) cil managed

param.name: owner
param.span: 聚合此扩展的可扩展对象。

span.span: The extensible object that aggregates this extension.

summary.span: 使对象可以查找它不再聚合的时间。

span.span: Enables an object to find out when it is no longer aggregated.

summary.span: 当从 属性中移除扩展时调用。

span.span: Called when an extension is removed from the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法以确定移除扩展的时间。Use the method to find out when the extension has been removed. 扩展可以使用此方法对可扩展对象上的事件解除挂钩。An extension can use this to unhook events on the extensible object. 扩展也可以从此方法中引发 ，以指示扩展一旦添加将无法移除。An extension can also throw from this method to indicate that, once added, the extension cannot be removed. 请注意，如果所有者对象已释放或已关闭，将不会调用此方法。Note that this method is not called when the owner object is disposed or closed. 如果需要，则由扩展或添加扩展的代码来挂钩相应的 事件或实现相应的接口（对于 ），以观察所有者的生命周期。If needed, it is up to the extension or the code adding the extension to hook the appropriate events or implement the appropriate interfaces (for ) to observe the lifecycle of the owner.
